Minimum:

  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 1060 RTX or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
